_header: Of Holy Mass in the secre
Subjects: Cosmas and Damian, saints, lives of; saints’ lives
_description: Lives of SS. Cosmas and Damian, in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
[o]f holy messe in þe secresyndry sanctis set we
                    se…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…als verraly helpe þai ws to twynefra hyne but det &
                    dedly syn

Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
